parameters.name: prompt
parameters.value:
You are a professional color palette generator. Generate a color palette for the theme: '{{ $json.theme }}' with style '{{ $json.style || 'balanced' }}'.

Number of colors needed: {{ $json.num_colors || 5 }}

Considerations:
- Use color theory principles (complementary, analogous, triadic, etc.)
- Ensure good contrast ratios for accessibility
- Include primary, secondary, and accent colors
- Consider the emotional impact of colors

Return ONLY a valid JSON object in this exact format:
{
  "palette": ["#hex1", "#hex2", "#hex3", "#hex4", "#hex5"],
  "name": "Descriptive Palette Name",
  "description": "Brief description of the palette",
  "harmony_type": "complementary|analogous|triadic|split-complementary|tetradic|monochromatic",
  "primary": "#hex",
  "secondary": "#hex",
  "accent": "#hex"
}
